rows.label: qst200711_msg0001
rows.name:
I... I can't believe it.
The great Yumyum, beaten twice...

rows.label: qst200711_msg0002
rows.name:
Right, so twice we beat you.
Isn't it time to call it quits?

rows.label: qst200711_msg0003
rows.name: Not even slightly...!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0004
rows.name:
Like every good contest, this one too
requires three rounds, with the final
one being the deciding one!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0005
rows.name:
We've already won two for three,
though? You can't hope to catch up.

rows.label: qst200711_msg0006
rows.name:
The final round decides who wins
and loses, I say! What came before
was just the warm-up!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0007
rows.name: He's making stuff up as he goes along...

rows.label: qst200711_msg0022
rows.name:
I'm fed up already! That jeopardous
of yours from last time wasn't even
tasty...

rows.label: qst200711_msg0023
rows.name:
How dare you...
But I think you'll like what I have in
store for the grand finale!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0008
rows.name:
For the last battle is something
truly special! Namely...

rows.label: qst200711_msg0009
rows.name: A mushroom!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0010
rows.name: A mushroom?! Nom!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0011
rows.name: Yes, a mushroom!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0012
rows.name:
A phantom fungus, from a mushroom
barque that sunk a century ago...
The Bloomshroom!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0021
rows.name:
They now lie in the Bastion of Varrac
in Temperantia, jealously guarded as
a holy relic by Ignas... Or so I hear.

rows.label: qst200711_msg0013
rows.name: That is what I challenge you to steal!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0014
rows.name:
A hundred-year old mushroom...?
Sounds delicious!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0015
rows.name:
After hundred years, any fungus
become ghost of fungus...

rows.label: qst200711_msg0016
rows.name:
You don't get it, Tora! It's that little
bit of rot that brings out the flavor!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0017
rows.name: I accept your challenge!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0018
rows.name:
In this last act, Yumyum will rise to the
occasion! And in doing so, steal back
from Idaten the Nopon's little hearts!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0019
rows.name: We gotta hurry!

rows.label: qst200711_msg0020
rows.name:
Can't miss the chance to eat
a lovely lovely Bloomshroom!
